data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Quattro, Joseph M., Driggers Iii, William B., Grady, James M., Ulrich, Glenn F., Roberts, Mark A. (2013): Sphyrna gilberti sp. nov., a new hammerhead shark (Carcharhiniformes, Sphyrnidae) from the western Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 3702 (2): 159-178, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3702.2.5
